body.name: Tripod Camera Tripods • 68" Lightweight Tripod for Camera and Video • 360° Panorama Ball Head Tripod with Removable Handle • Extra 1/4" QR Plate and Phone Holder • Compatible with Canon Nikon Sony
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 6 hrs 58 mins
features: 【Portable Tripod & Carry Bag】The tripod is only 3.85 lbs weight, Three aluminum alloy legs can be folded back with min storage size 16.5 inch, The portable carry bag make it easy for outdoor and travel photography, We additional 1/4" universal QR plate can support two devices quickly working, This tripod is a good choice for Photographer.

【Sturdy and Durable Performance】The tripod’s forks, knobs and legs are made of high-quality Aluminum material, Double-groove pipe diameter up to 26mm, maximum load capacity 33lb, The tripod tube surface is hard anodized and special sandblasting treatment, Even working in harsh environments such as rough ground , The surface of the tripod will not be easily scratched, This can greatly improve the service life of the tripod.

【36mm CNC Metal Ball Head 】The tripod head is fully CNC machine-processed and equipped with a 36mm large ball head. Its precision and durability are better than ordinary casting process ball heads, Two independent pan/tilt control knobs make operation very simple, You can fast rotating the ball head to obtain 360°panoramic shooting angle, The accurate 360° scale with three Level bubble meter allow for precise image alignment.

【Ball Head With Detachable Handle】The tripod head comes with an removable aluminum handle, Compared with sigle ball head, it is easier to operate and Horizontal rotation shooting, Aslo we have additionally equipped a handle locking knob to prevent loss.

【Flexible operation and Monopod】4-section column legs with quick release flip-locks allows you to adjust the working height from 16.5” to 68” in seconds. 3-stage leg angle adjustment system support for level shooting in any condition, The detachable foam handle legs attached the center column can quickly transform into a monopod or trekking pole.

【Wide Compatibility】The tripod with 1/4" and 3/8" Universal screws, which makes it compatible with most devices on the market with 1/4" and 3/8" threads, Such as Dslr cameras, Projectors.Telescopes, ring lights, video recorders, etc. The package comes with a 360° cellphone clip, which compatible with Apple, Samsung, Motorona, Philips and other mobile phones.

【After-Sales Service and Purpose】We provide 7*24h customer service, 30-day free of return, One year warranty, If you have any related questions, please feel free to contact us, Our after-sales service will contact you and solved the problem at frist time, Your satisfaction is our ultimate pursuit.
❤︎NOTE— For video cameras or long-axis telescopes equipped with telephoto zoom lenses, You will need to purchase a mounting ring or telephoto lens mount for better balance.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: To make a better Tripods for every customer, We pay more attention to each parts and improving it, Your satisfaction is our ultimate pursuit. Tripod for Camera, Travel Camera Tripod with Handle, Aluminum Heavy Duty Video Tripod, Ball Head Tripod with 1/4"QR and Phone Clip, 16.5" Folding Size Portable and Carry Bag — The tripod is only 3.85 lbs weight, Three aluminum alloy legs can be folded back with min storage size 16.5”, 4-section column legs adjust height from 16.5” to 68” . maximum load capacity 33lb, The portable carry bag make it easy for outdoor and travel photography, We additional a extra 1/4" universal QR plate can support two devices quickly working, This tripod is a good choice for Photographer. Focus on Detail — To make a better camera tripod for every customer, we pay more attention to each part and improving it. Such as 36mm CNC process larger Ball Head, Detachable Pan Handle, Detachable rubber foot pads, Aluminum tube surface hard anodized and special sandblasting treatment, Improved central shaft locking knob inner collar, Fashionable portable carry bag, and extra 360° rotatable phone clip. Sturdy and Durable Performance — The tripod’s forks, knobs and legs are made of high-quality Aluminum material, Double-groove pipe diameter up to 26mm, maximum load capacity 33lb, The tripod tube surface is hard anodized and special sandblasting treatment, Even working in harsh environments such as rough ground , The surface of the tripod will not be easily scratched, This can greatly improve the service life of the tripod.

Compatible with most devices with 1/4" and 3/8" threads, Such as Dslr cameras, Projectors.Telescopes, Ring lights, Video recorders, Cellphones, etc. Camera series — Canon, Nikon, Sony, Panasonic, Olympus, Fujifilm, Leica and other cameras with 1/4" or 3/8" threads. Cellphone series — Apple, Samsung, Motorona, Philips and other cellphones width from 4.7"-6.8" In Size. Other series — Projectors. Telescopes, Ring lights, Webcam, Camcorder, and other series with 1/4" and 3/8" threads. NOTE — For video cameras or long-axis telescopes equipped with telephoto zoom lenses, you will need to purchase a mounting ring or telephoto lens mount for better balance.

360 ° CNC larger Metal Panorama Ball Head with 26mm diameter aluminum legs meet your all shooting angles needs 36mm CNC Metal Ball Head — The tripod head is fully CNC machine-processed and equipped with a 36mm large ball head. Its precision and durability are better than ordinary casting process ball heads, Two independent pan/tilt control knobs make operation very simple, You can fast rotating the ball head to obtain 360°panoramic shooting angle, The accurate 360° scale with three Level bubble meter allow for precise image alignment. Flexible operation and Monopod — 4-section column legs with quick release flip-locks allows you to adjust the working height from 16.5” to 68” in seconds. 3-stage leg angle adjustment system support for level shooting in any condition, The detachable foam handle legs attached the center column can quickly transform into a monopod or trekking pole. Macro Photography — Use the upside-down central column for macro photography, to take a closer shot of the object. The central column can be elongated by rotating the knob system, and you can shoot anything at a smaller angle. Try it!

Detachable ball head handle suitable for both single and handle ball head photographer. Detachable ball head handle The tripod head comes with an detachable aluminum handle, suitable for both single and handle ball head photographer, Compared with sigle ball head, it is easier panoramic photography or video recording, Aslo we have additionally equipped a handle locking knob to prevent loss. Disassembly method of detachable handle 1: Loosen the detachable handle locking screw. 2: Insert the ball head handle and tighten the locking screw.

Detachable for used as a monopod or a walking stick and Central tube inversion transform macro photography. How to achieve Monopod or walking stick Mode （1）Unscrew the Central tube hook and loosen the Central tube locking knob, then remove the Central tube. （2）Loosen and remove the detachable leg with foam handle （3）Connect and tighten the removed Central tube and column legs. How to achieve Low Angle Shooting Mode （1）Unscrew the Central tube hook and loosen the Central tube locking knob, then remove the central shaft. （2）Invert the removed Central tube and insert it into the fork, then tighten the Central tube locking knob. （3）Adjust the leg height and ball head angle to achieve macro shooting.

The rich packaging list and additional extra parts meet the needs of various scenarios and greatly improve the service life of the tripod. 1 X Extra QR Plate 1 X Extra Handle Knob 2 X Extra Rubber Foot 3 X Allen Key 1 X Extra Central Tube Locking Knob

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This tripod is a must have if you go on solo adventures with your partner, we’ve taken amazing pictures with this tripod and it’s great quality!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great quality and usable tripod.
reviews.reviewText: Very sturdy tripod with great swivel head and clever monied.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 3, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Wow amazing tripod
reviews.reviewText: I like that this is light and so compact that fits on my carryon bag with lots of options on versatility of usage as a photographer this what I'm looking for in awhile plus you have a monopad option and with added phone attachments for easy use.. You really can't go wrong. I thought it was hard at first but when you've other tripod you'll be able to work with this like a charm... I can't wait to bring this on my next travel shoots.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 23, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Once you get the hang of it, you’ll like it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Well built, sturdy, very functional tripod
reviews.reviewText: When the tripod that I bought in 1965 lost a key element of one leg's locking mechanism while I was in the woods I went shopping for a new one. This product is the one I decided on based on the feature description, it's weight, and what seemed to be it's ability to adapt to any surface and terrain. I wasn't disappointed. I've taken it into the field twice now without problems. I haven't used the unipod feature since I have a good unipod I use when I need one. That said, I have disassembled the unit to extract the unipod. It comes apart smoothly and goes back together the same way. I would buy this product again if I needed a second tripod.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 25, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on August 29, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Versatile yet amazingly portable.
reviews.reviewText: I think the first thing I noticed about this was that it has such a solid feel - like an expensive Manfrotto tripod. It came packaged well in a durable case with attachments for SLRs or Phones. The legs are sturdy with locking mechanisms and adaptable to a tripod, monopod, or even an upside down tripod that lets the camera “hang” from the middle of the legs.Definitely impressed with the durability on this - I’ve even used it to hold an 18” ring light. This was a great find!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good Value For Price
reviews.reviewText: Easy to set up and great value
